mapper.select: SELECT job_details.`JOB_NAME` as jobName, job_details.`JOB_GROUP` as jobGroup, job_details.`JOB_CLASS_NAME` as JobClassName, cron_triggers.`CRON_EXPRESSION` as cronExpression, cron_triggers.`TIME_ZONE_ID` as timeZoneId, qrtz_triggers.`TRIGGER_NAME` as triggerName, qrtz_triggers.`TRIGGER_GROUP` as triggerGroup, qrtz_triggers.`TRIGGER_STATE` as triggerState FROM `QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS` job_details LEFT JOIN `QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS` cron_triggers ON job_details.`JOB_NAME` = cron_triggers.`TRIGGER_NAME` AND job_details.`JOB_GROUP` = cron_triggers.`TRIGGER_GROUP` LEFT JOIN `QRTZ_TRIGGERS` qrtz_triggers ON qrtz_triggers.`TRIGGER_NAME` = job_details.`JOB_NAME` AND qrtz_triggers.`TRIGGER_GROUP` = job_details.`JOB_GROUP`
